verbose_text: AT514 was also found to inhibit the pro survival signals of Bcl2, phosphatidylinositol-3 kinase, and protein kinase C. Also, the S. marcescens derived metabolic compound prodigiosin was found to agonize p53 induced apoptosis and suppress the activity of survivin in acute lymphoblastic leukemia.
evidence: AT514 was also found to inhibit the pro-survival signals of Bcl2, phosphatidylinositol-3 kinase
